ygData.subject: BPEL for REST?
ygData.msgSnippet: OK...we all know that BPEL engines typically consume WSDL and SOAP. Anybody know of any similar beasties that do orchestration in the REST world? That is, BPEL

OK...we all know that BPEL engines typically consume WSDL and SOAP.

Anybody know of any similar beasties that do orchestration in the REST world? 
That is, BPEL engines that can do resource manipulation/orchestration across 
the usual HTTP verbs?  

Thanks!
